Text: This only costs a few pounds, and takes about 3 minutes to download from the App Store.

@MrTechno Did it not even occur to you that this might already be here -- over and over and over? Duplicate files spread out the seeders and reduce download speeds for everyone. They also increase the clutter on this site. Next time, search first -- it takes five seconds -- and then upload only if the file you have is not present or poorly seeded.
